name: Wings Of Destiny
summary:
World War II has begun and the battle for air supremacy is raging. The skies are seething and you're at the heart of the struggle.

Wings of Destiny delivers authentic air combat in the era's most famous fighter planes- the Messerschmit Me109 and Me262, the P51 Mustang and the Supermarine Spitfire. With 3 difficulty levels and a no-fuss control system, Wings of Destiny is the accessible flight sim where the action never stops. And with multiplayer network options for up to 4 pilots, you won't be safe until you're back at base.
